name: Purple Rock Scissors
description: Purple, Rock, Scissors (PRPL) is an Orlando-based product design company that designs and develops innovative digital products and services for forward-thinking brands. With a multidisciplinary team of creatives, strategists, and engineers, we cultivate meaningful relationships with our clients and fulfill our shared vision for a smarter future. We attract audacious individuals and partner with companies who are willing to push boundaries and explore with us.
